text:
JingChi| Senior Software Engineer - Front-End Sunnyvale|| Full-time | ONSITE |

JingChi is looking for an inventive and design-minded Front-End Software Engineer to help craft the experience and accelerate the introduction of self-driving and its many benefits to the world. You are going to pursue unique features and dispatch systems in order to make self-driving rides a seamless experience.

Apply:http://jingchi.ai/jobs?gh_jid=1228561
